server_selection.question: Which server are you playing on?

questions: What is the topic of this ticket? Include a brief summary of why you made this ticket...
Please include any links that may be relevant
pre-message: Welcome to the General Support System! Please let us know how we can help you by answering the following questions. Our team is here to assist you.
post-message: Thank you for reaching out to our support team! We have received your request and will get back to you as soon as possible.
accept-message: Your support request has been resolved. If you need further assistance, feel free to open another ticket.
deny-message: Your support request has been closed. If you have further questions, please contact us again.
feedback_questions: How was your experience with our support team?
How would you rate your experience out of 5?
Would you recommend our support system to others?
Do you have any suggestions for improving our support process?
successful_feedback_message: Thank you for your feedback! Your input helps us improve our support system for everyone.
